Translations.Text: He nabi, imanadara narira yakhana apanara kache ese anugatyera sapatha kare ye, tara allahara sathe ka'uke sarika karabe na, curi karabe na, byabhicara karabe na, tadera santanaderake hatya karabe na, jaraja santanake sbamira aurasa theke apana garbhajata santana bale mithya dabi karabe na ebam bhala kaje apanara abadhyata karabe na, takhana tadera anugatya grahana karuna ebam tadera jan'ye allahara kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya allaha ksamasila atyanta dayalu.
Muminagana, allaha ye jatira prati rusta, tomara tadera sathe bandhutba karo na. Tara parakala samparke nirasa haye geche yemana kabarastha kapherara nirasa haye geche.
Nabhomandale o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kare. Tini parakranta prajnabana.
Muminagana! Tomara ya kara na, ta kena bala
tomara ya kara na, ta bala allahara kache khuba'i asantosajanaka.
Allaha taderake bhalabasena, yara tamra pathe saribad'dhabhabe lara'i kare, yena tara sisagalano pracira.

Smarana kara, yakhana musa (ah) tamra sampradayake balalah he amara sampradaya, tomara kena amake kasta da'o, athaca tomara jana ye, ami tomadera kache allahara rasula. Atahpara tara yakhana bakrata abalambana karala, takhana allaha tadera antarake bakra kare dilena. Allaha papacari sampradayake pathapradarsana karena na.
